description: This special variant includes the iconic LEGO Star Wars Luke Skywalker's X-Wing Fighter (75301) PLUS a bonus Rebel Trooper Battle Pack. Build the X-Wing with an opening cockpit, retractable landing gear, and spring-loaded shooters. The bonus pack adds 4 Rebel Trooper minifigures and a speeder bike to expand your Star Wars battles.

description: A beautiful pink twist on a timeless classic. The My First Steel & Wood Wagon features a durable steel body, real wood sides, and sturdy rolling wheels. Perfect for imaginative play, hauling toys, or a stroll around the block. The handle folds underneath for easy storage. This smaller version is perfect for toddlers.

categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction Toys > Building Sets
title: LEGO® Star Wars™ Luke Skywalker’s X-Wing Fighter™ - 474 Pieces
description: Recreate classic scenes from the Star Wars™ trilogy with this awesome building toy for kids, featuring a LEGO® brick-built version of Luke Skywalker’s iconic X-wing Fighter (75301). It’s packed with authentic details to delight fans, including an opening LEGO minifigure cockpit, space for R2-D2, wings that can be switched to attack position at the touch of a button, retractable landing gear and 2 spring-loaded shooters. This version includes Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia and General Dodonna LEGO minifigures.

description: Drive the fan-favorite Hot Wheels Monster Trucks RC Race Ace in 1:24 scale! This blue variant comes with massive Terrain Action Tires to get over obstacles and crush the competition. It features full-function remote-control capabilities – forward, reverse, left, and right steering. Operates on a 2.4 GHz frequency so kids can use it with other RC vehicles without interference. Requires 5 AA batteries (not included).

title: Catan Board Game: 5-6 Player Extension
description: Now up to 6 players can settle Catan! The 5-6 Player Extension for The Settlers of Catan allows you to add up to two more opponents to the game. This is not a complete game and requires a Catan base game to play. Includes 11 new terrain hexes, 2 frame pieces with harbors, 2 all-sea frame pieces, 2 sets of wooden settlements, cities, and roads, 25 resource cards, 9 development cards, and 2 building costs cards.
